item.title: CVE-2024-49315|2024-10-21T15:12:26.138Z -- codeflock -- free%20download%20manager
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in CodeFlock FREE DOWNLOAD MANAGER allows Path Traversal.This issue affects FREE DOWNLOAD MANAGER: from n/a through 1.0.0.
